column5: Heading to a mystery  lake in the AM. I want you to tell me what you would bring tackle wise.
Don't tell me this is another expedition for those disgusting Bass?
Jigs & grubs, spinners,Weedless Spoon,Spro Frog,buzz-bait,spinnerbait,jitterbug & a Harmonica to please the Fishing Spirits!
jigs and a grubs,  senko and some hooks, a few spinner baits.  Cheers!

Red & white bobber Mepps red/black #3 & #5 White spinnerbait Black spinnerbait Williams wabler (wrinkle finish gold/silver) Original Rap F9 blue/silver Jointed Rap J11 Chartreuse Jitterbug Spook Frog pattern Senkos 5" pink, watermelon Super Shad Rap perch

Lunch Snacks Lots of water. Rain gear - just in case. Fishing License  I'd just use my partner's tackle...esp if it's his mystery lake.  I'd try to go light....  - Tray of jigs and fav plastics - Tray of spoons and inline spinners - Box of larger spinner baits. - Tray of cranks that dive from 3 to 10 feet. - Tray of terminal tackle.
2-4 & TNT should take care of everything.
A white tandem spinnerbait, 7 inch plastic worms & texas rig gear, senkos of course, some crankbaits, jigs and grubs.  Oh and don't forget the topwaters!
And what is this for....entertainment? I have a bucket of Lego ready for you the next time we go out. -Brian
Lego? Really..can I come with ya's too,Bri?
Aww man, is it the Star Wars Lego set? I'm comin' too!
These aren't the speedy responses I was anticipating... but sure! Let's just say that ccmt can not be trusted with a tray of terminal tackle.
Well you definately have to bring a red devil B  Joey

Im bring a devil alright,but he aint red.LOL  I have got 4 rods set  for the trip. One with a jig and pig(Don't tell me this is another expedition for those disgusting Bass  ),the other with senko style bait,the other with a Spro Frog(well it,s a scum frog),the other with a small Mizmo craw tube. There might be crappie theres,so Im told.  I,ll get back to you all when I return. Im off to re-spool some reels,sharpen some hooks,and find a shirt to wear. Im not one for that pornografic fishing thing.   GCD
Big spinner bait and bucktail 9" sledge some custom woodie top water and walk the dog lures and a few other small 9-12" baits  I would be trying to clear the way for you bass fishing
Come on!!! Jeez...ONE time I spill a few hooks and pieces of split shot and you don't let me forget it.... LOL

I thought we all forgot about it until Steven Spielberg's audio effects department called to inquire about recording the sound of split shot sinkers in my bilge pump. As it turns out, it sounds remarkably like marbles in a blender. Just kidding... bilge is fine but I'll always be looking for creative ways to remind you about it!! -Brian
